attributes.action: The only government should be the universe, and her morals. ANARCHY!
attributes.additional_details: Because in the current system of greed, hypocrisy and arrogance it is nigh impossible to live in the service of humanity, ergo we must establish society anew, free from corruption and self-interest and in the pursuit of kindness and real community.
attributes.background: Sack everyone associated with the government, and let people live based on the moral code of the universe, which will manifest itself in due course. So abolish yourself pretty please.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

We also can't accept petitions calling for people to be fired.
